# shadcn-ember

> shadcn-ember is a collection of beautifully-designed, accessible components for Ember applications. It is built with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Glimmer template tag components (gts files). This is an Ember port of shadcn/ui, following modern Ember (Polaris edition) conventions. Open Source. Open Code. AI-Ready.

## CLI

shadcn-ember provides a CLI for easy component installation and project setup:

- [CLI Documentation](https://shadcn-ember.com/docs/cli): Complete CLI reference and usage guide.

**Main Commands:**

- `npx shadcn-ember@latest init` - Initialize configuration and dependencies for a new project
- `npx shadcn-ember@latest add [component]` - Add components to your project
- `npx shadcn-ember@latest view [item]` - View items from the registry before installing

## Ember Conventions

shadcn-ember follows modern Ember (Polaris edition) conventions:

- Vite as build system
- TypeScript for type safety
- Template tag components (gts files) for components, route templates, and tests
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- `@tracked` and getters for reactivity (no classic Ember objects)
- Arrow functions over `@action` within components
- Lucide icons via imports (e.g., `import Check from '~icons/lucide/check'`)
- All helpers/modifiers/components must be imported (no global usage)
- Template-only components where possible

## Key differences from shadcn/ui React

- Uses Glimmer template tag components (`.gts` files) instead of JSX/TSX
- Component props passed with `@` prefix (e.g., `@variant="default"`)
  - Pass `className` via the `@class` component argument when the component signature supports it, so it gets merged correctly
- Uses `@tracked` decorator and getters instead of React hooks (useState, useEffect, useMemo)
- Event handling via `{{on}}` modifier instead of JSX event props
- Context passing via `ember-provide-consume-context` instead of React Context API
- Icons imported from `~icons/lucide/*` instead of lucide-react
- Missing components: Alert Dialog, Calendar, Carousel, Chart, Form (with validation), Menubar, Navigation Menu, Resizable
